publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3593# Donald Gorrie: St Andrew's Day-That the Parliament believes that the Scottish Executive and other appropriate bodies should consider making St Andrew's Day a national holiday, either by replacing one of the existing holidays in May or by making it an additional holiday.
S1M-3593# St Andrew's Day (lodged on 18 November 2002) Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-3593# St Andrew's Day (lodged on 18 November 2002) Tavish Scott*, Mr Mike Rumbles*, George Lyon*, Robert Brown*, John Farquhar Munro*, Margaret Smith*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*, Iain Smith*, Alasdair Morgan*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Fergus Ewing*
S1M-3593# St Andrew's Day (lodged on 18 November 2002) Michael Russell*, Mr Keith Raffan*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Fiona McLeod*, Irene McGugan*, Brian Adam*

S1M-3593# Donald Gorrie: St Andrew's Day—That the Parliament believes that the Scottish Executive and other appropriate bodies should consider making St Andrew’s Day a national holiday, either by replacing one of the existing holidays in May or by making it an additional holiday. Supported by: Michael Matheson, Alex Neil, Tavish Scott, Mr Mike Rumbles, George Lyon, Robert Brown, John Farquhar Munro, Margaret Smith, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Ms Sandra White, Iain Smith, Alasdair Morgan, Christine Grahame, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Fergus Ewing, Michael Russell, Mr Keith Raffan, Mr Jamie Stone, Fiona McLeod, Irene McGugan, Brian Adam
S1M-3593# St Andrew's Day (lodged on 18 November 2002) Robin Harper*
S1M-3593# St Andrew's Day (lodged on 18 November 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3593# St Andrew's Day (lodged on 18 November 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Ian Jenkins*
S1M-3593# St Andrew's Day (lodged on 18 November 2002) Linda Fabiani*
S1M-3593# St Andrew's Day (lodged on 18 November 2002) Andrew Wilson*
